attrs.name: modelValue / v-model
attrs.desc: Set the value of the drop-down list box.

attrs.name: placeholder
attrs.desc: Set the prompt placeholder text in the text box.

attrs.name: popper-class
attrs.desc: Add a class name for the popper. For details, see the popover component.

attrs.name: popper-append-to-body
attrs.desc: Indicates whether to insert the pop-up box to the body element. If an error occurs in locating a fault in the dialog box that is displayed, set this attribute to false (for details, see the select component).
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: fetch-currency
attrs.desc: The user-defined amount query interface returns a Promise object.

attrs.name: fields
attrs.desc: User-defined data mapping. This parameter is mandatory when the framework service is not used.

attrs.name: size
attrs.desc: Size of the text box. This parameter is valid only when type!="textarea". The optional values of this attribute are medium / small / mini

attrs.name: clearable
attrs.desc: Whether to display the Clear button; Clearable
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: disabled
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.
